messages.message:
we keep 7d of spans as set here by `ES_JAEGER_MAX_AGE`
https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/master/deployment-configs/base/jaeger.yml#L280
its odd that they did not see 5d old data. @raman.goel @puneet can you please take a look at this in the ZD ticket

Hey team - I will like to confirm what release they are working on. In 23.01, there was some error because of which the jaeger indices were getting deleted. I had a fix and backported in 23.01 a week back. PR:  https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/36153. Just wanted to confirm if this PR is shipped to them.
Hey Raman,, thank you for the additional information there they are currently on `22.10`  was the bug in all versions `<=23.01`?
No Austin, this bug was introduced in `23.01` only.
